  • SELECT Markup

  1. <!doctype html>
  2. <html>
  3. <head>
  4. <title>Add options dynamically to bootstrap-select</title>
  5. <link href="css/bootstrap.css" rel="stylesheet" />
  6. <link href="css/custom.css" rel="stylesheet" />
  7. <link href="plugins/bootstrap-select/css/bootstrap-select.css" rel="stylesheet" />
  8. <style type="text/css">
  9. .dropdown-menu {
  10.     -webkit-touch-callout: none;
  11.     -webkit-user-select: none;
  12.     -khtml-user-select: none;
  13.     -moz-user-select: none;
  14.     -ms-user-select: none;
  15.     user-select: none;
  16. }
  17.  
  18. .dropdown-menu a {
  19.    overflow: hidden;
  20.    outline: none;
  21. }
  22.  
  23. .additem input
  24. {
  25.    border:0;
  26.    margin:-3px;
  27.    padding:3px;
  28.    outline: none;
  29.    color: #000;
  30.    width: 99%;
  31. }
  32.  
  33. .additem:hover input
  34. {
  35.    background-color: #f5f5f5;
  36. }
  37.  
  38. .additem .check-mark
  39. {
  40.    opacity: 0;
  41.    z-index: -1000;
  42. }
  43.  
  44. .addnewicon {
  45.    position: relative;
  46.    padding: 4px;
  47.    margin: -8px;
  48.    padding-right: 50px;
  49.    margin-right: -50px;
  50.    color: #aaa;
  51. }
  52.  
  53. .addnewicon:hover {
  54.    color: #222;
  55. }
  56. </style>
  57. </head>
  58. <body>
  59. <div class="wrapper">
  60.   <header>
  61.     <div class="container">
  62.     <h1 class="col-lg-9">Add options dynamically to bootstrap-select</h1>
  63.     </div>
  64.   </header>
  65.   <div class="container">
  66.     <h5>Author: Julian Hansen</h5>
  67. <div class="row">
  68.       <div class="col-lg-6">
  69.         <h2>Select Sample #1</h2>
  70.         <select class="selectpicker" id="select1">
  71.           <option>Mustard</option>
  72.           <option>Ketchup</option>
  73.           <option>Relish</option>
  74.         </select>    
  75.       </div>
  76.       <div class="col-lg-6">
  77.         <h2>Select Sample #2</h2>
  78.         <select class="selectpicker" id="select2">
  79.           <option>Banana</option>
  80.           <option>Peach</option>
  81.           <option>Orange</option>
  82.         </select>    
  83.       </div>
  84.     </div>
  85. </div>
  86. </div>
  87. <footer>
  88.   <div class="container">
  89.     Copyright Julian Hansen &copy; 2015
  90.   </div>
  91. </footer>
  92.  
  93. <script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery.js"></script>
  94.  
  95. <!-- Latest compiled and minified JavaScript -->
  96. <script src="js/bootstrap.js"></script>
  97. <script src="plugins/bootstrap-select/js/bootstrap-select.js"></script>
  98. <script>
  99. $(function() {
  100.   var content = "<input type=text onKeyDown='event.stopPropagation();' onKeyPress='addSelectInpKeyPress(this,event)' onClick='event.stopPropagation()' placeholder='Add item'> <span class='glyphicon glyphicon-plus addnewicon' onClick='addSelectItem(this,event,1);'></span>";
  101.  
  102.   var divider = $('<option/>')
  103.           .addClass('divider')
  104.           .data('divider', true);
  105.           
  106.  
  107.   var addoption = $('<option/>')
  108.           .addClass('additem')
  109.           .data('content', content)
  110.       
  111.   $('.selectpicker')
  112.           .append(divider)
  113.           .append(addoption)
  114.           .selectpicker();
  115.  
  116. });
  117.  
  118. function addSelectItem(t,ev)
  119. {
  120.    ev.stopPropagation();
  121.  
  122.    var txt=$(t).prev().val().replace(/[|]/g,"");
  123.    if ($.trim(txt)=='') return;
  124.    var p=$(t).closest('.bootstrap-select').prev();
  125.    var o=$('option', p).eq(-2);
  126.    o.before( $("<option>", { "selected": true, "text": txt}) );
  127.    p.selectpicker('refresh');
  128. }
  129.  
  130. function addSelectInpKeyPress(t,ev)
  131. {
  132.    ev.stopPropagation();
  133.  
  134.    // do not allow pipe character
  135.    if (ev.which==124) ev.preventDefault();
  136.  
  137.    // enter character adds the option
  138.    if (ev.which==13)
  139.    {
  140.       ev.preventDefault();
  141.       addSelectItem($(t).next(),ev);
  142.    }
  143. }
  144. </script>
  145. </body>
  146. </html>
  147.  
  148.

  6.     -moz-user-select: none;
  7.     -ms-user-select: none;
  8.     user-select: none;
  9. }
  10.  
  11. .dropdown-menu a {
  12.    overflow: hidden;
  13.    outline: none;
  14. }
  15.  
  16. .additem input
  17. {
  18.    border:0;
  19.    margin:-3px;
  20.    padding:3px;
  21.    outline: none;
  22.    color: #000;
  23.    width: 99%;
  24. }
  25.  
  26. .additem:hover input
  27. {
  28.    background-color: #f5f5f5;
  29. }
  30.  
  31. .additem .check-mark
  32. {
  33.    opacity: 0;
  34.    z-index: -1000;
  35. }
  36.

  38.    position: relative;
  39.    padding: 4px;
  40.    margin: -8px;
  41.    padding-right: 50px;
  42.    margin-right: -50px;
  43.    color: #aaa;
  44. }

  47.    color: #222;
  48. }
  49. </style>

  1. <script>
  2. $(function() {
  3.   var content = "<input type=text onKeyDown='event.stopPropagation();' onKeyPress='addSelectInpKeyPress(this,event)' onClick='event.stopPropagation()' placeholder='Add item'> <span class='glyphicon glyphicon-plus addnewicon' onClick='addSelectItem(this,event,1);'></span>";
  4.  
  5.   var divider = $('<option/>')
  6.           .addClass('divider')
  7.           .data('divider', true);
  8.           
  9.  
  10.   var addoption = $('<option/>')
  11.           .addClass('additem')
  12.           .data('content', content)
  13.       
  14.   $('.selectpicker')
  15.           .append(divider)
  16.           .append(addoption)
  17.           .selectpicker();
  18.  
  19. });
  20.  
  21. function addSelectItem(t,ev)
  22. {
  23.    ev.stopPropagation();
  24.  
  25.    var txt=$(t).prev().val().replace(/[|]/g,"");
  26.    if ($.trim(txt)=='') return;
  27.    var p=$(t).closest('.bootstrap-select').prev();
  28.    var o=$('option', p).eq(-2);
  29.    o.before( $("<option>", { "selected": true, "text": txt}) );
  30.    p.selectpicker('refresh');
  31. }
  32.  
  33. function addSelectInpKeyPress(t,ev)
  34. {
  35.    ev.stopPropagation();
  36.  
  37.    // do not allow pipe character
  38.    if (ev.which==124) ev.preventDefault();
  39.  
  40.    // enter character adds the option
  41.    if (ev.which==13)
  42.    {
  43.       ev.preventDefault();
  44.       addSelectItem($(t).next(),ev);
  45.    }
  46. }
  47. </script>
